description:
Sloan is a country boy, as evidenced by his thick Southern drawl.
His body is lean and long, just like his cock.
He is kind of a dude of few words. Kind of shy to start with, but he has a naughty side, and he really liked showing off for the camera.
He wasn't down for doing a Serviced video on his first visit, but I know he said he had fun, and wants to come back to do more. Pretty sure he will be back.
For now though, enjoy his solo. He certainly did!
title: Sloan - Solo
